text: Owen Roizman (September 22, 1936 â€“ January 6, 2023) was an American cinematographer and movie director. He had five Academy Award nominations for Best Cinematography. His best known movies are The French Connection (1971), The Exorcist (1973), Network (1976), Tootsie (1982) and Wyatt Earp (1994). He was given an Academy Honorary Award in 2017. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2023 deaths Category:American cinematographers Category:Movie directors from New York City
title: Owen Roizman
